creator: raoni@mondo.com.br
text:
The packages of bin files in download of Ant 1.5 is with version 1.4.1

I tried download files .tar.bz2 and .tar.gz
both did come with version 1.4.1

I've verified both files and both contain

Apache Ant version 1.5 compiled on July 9 2002
creator: bodewig@apache.org
